alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 13 at 3:10AM CDT until April 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, between 1 and 3 feet above normal high tide expected. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, between 1 and 2 feet above normal tide expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Warning, until 7 AM CDT this morning. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
